values:
one more day until thanksgiving.  woot woot.  i guess.

my panic attacks are getting worse.  if i don't get back on meds soon i'm going to have a heart attack.  i swear.  yay for $100 co-pays at my doctor.  damn.

trevor comes home friday.  kayla's back today.  should be a good weekend as long as i don't run into anyone that hates me.  which might actually be kind of hard, since the numbers keep going up.  great, huh.

still kind of sick, my cold just won't quit.  

i want to go shopping.  i want a dress.  i don't know why, but i just want one.  one of those days i guess.

Making the Band

Happiest girl in the world.  I've been waiting for tonight for over a year.

All the girls I wanted.

I heart Aubrey and Aundrea

Oh my mother fucking God.

My license was suspended for 2 months.  

Meaning I missed FOB, and Madison.

Meaning I have to be shuttled around by mom.

Meaning I have disappointed my parents again.

All I want is to get out of this place.  Go somewhere new and start over. 


I think a new beginning would be good for me.  I love my friends, but I don't love the place I'm at right now.

I think I'm going to be alone for the rest of my life.

I didn't get the apprenticeship.  Don't really know what I'm gonna do.

Take some classes at TC for Administrative Assistant I think.  Be someone's personal secretary or something.  

Going to Madison for 5 days.  Leave next Wednesday for Milwaukee to see Fall Out Boy at the Rave, then off to Madison until Sunday.  Can't wait to get away.

Things are kind of off right now.  Brandon's gone for 9 days, Cammie's got a new man, Josh and I aren't speaking.  Maybe I'll give Justin a call this weekend.  

Someone called me at 3am last night.  Someone I haven't talked to in months.  I really nervous as to why, but they left no message.  I don't know why these people have been calling me lately.  Had another strange phone call a few weeks ago as well that I didn't answer and no message was left. 

I really just want to focus on Madison and how much fun I have with my friends there.  

Nicole and Mary Beth are coming home this weekend too.

And the weekend for Thanksgiving they'll be back again.

Ashley, when are you coming home?  Or aren't you?

So I'm really glad I ended up going to Madison Saturday.  I sometimes forget how great my friends are.  

No forget isn't the right word.  I just push it all to the back of mind as to not have to think about how lost I feel without them.  

I'm actually at work right now.  Have rooms to clean but no patience to do it.

Hung out with Mary Beth the other day when she came home.  I miss CCQ.  Which stands for Chili Con Queso and I just found that out.  Sad.

I find out about the apprenticeship soon.  I'm nervous.  I want it, but I know it'll change everything.  I don't think I'm not ready for more change.

I can't stop thinking about this summer.  It's so far away, but I feel as though it's coming.  Who's coming home, and who's staying?  Will everything be the same?  Will we all still be friends?  Or at least fake friends?  

I don't know anymore.  And I don't like that.

So I haven't died.  Just got the internet disconnected.

So much.  No time.  Not interested.

After last night I can die happy.  I finally did the one thing I've wanted to do for the last two years.  And I don't care if it leads to nothing, or if it's over.  Because it happened.

And I don't think I'm supposed to have friends meet friends because they always fight.

And I have nice cleavage.  I guess.  Dumb drunk boys.

Boys.Boys.Boys.

Sick of them.  Don't like me, I'm not worth your time.  You however, can, even though you won't.  I know, right.

Confusing.

I'm grounded.  I guess coming home at 3 am is bad.  Damn boy. Ha.

I pierced my nose again.  There's a hoop right next to my stud.  Cute I think.  Maybe a little too ghetto for me.

I told a girl that I wanted to marry a pastor last night.  She said I didn't look like someone who would.  What does that mean?

I miss Madison already.  Two weeks to go.

Ugh.  Bye.

Friday night.
       Cammie and I stopped at Becker's to cheer him up.  Went to Brandon Dean's and hung out there for awhile.  Headed over to some Norbert party that was over, so Cammie and I snuck away and went to her friend Tim's.  Chilled there for awhile and drank.  Watched the boys build a ginormous beer can pyramid.  And then watched it fall.

Saturday night.
      Cammie met some boys while she was getting gas and got us invited to a kegger out by Denmark.  Hung out there for a few hours, met some really nice guys.  Went to a three barrell in Suamico with a live band after that.  Saw some people from work.  Got really drunk and almost thrown in a pond twice.  Fell in a bathtub.  Had too much fun.

Sunday.
     Went swimming somewhere in Kewaunee with Cammie, Jake, Adam, and some other creepy kid.  Went and saw the Exorcism of Emily Rose with Cammie, Holiday, Aaron and Brandon.  Went over to Nick's apartment and watched him get VERY drunk.  Take off his clothes, tie a rope to "himself" and the refrigerator.  And proceed to close it.  Ouch.  Have Nick smash a piece of plastic over his head to see if it would break.  It didn't.  Let people shoot him multiple times with a dart gun.  Fucking crazy ass kid.  

Monday.
     Interview for the apprenticeship today.  And I missed it.  Some asshole on 441 decided to run me off the road.  I spun out and ended up in the ditch.  Thankfully a really cute boy pulled over and helped me while the asshole took off.  Needed 4 new tires and an alignment.  The fucking wire was coming out of them.  So I have to call back and reschedule that.

Well, we're no longer friends after last night.

That one lame comment.  The previous one from your friend.  Boiled over.

I don't really understand why this hurts me.  It was you that was supposed to be hurt.  And I really think you could care less.

I need lessons on how to mess with boys brains.

Because this completely backfired on me.  Somehow, you came out ahead.  You won.  And I can not for the life of me figure out how this happened, where it all went wrong.

I let you get to me.  I put too much effort into it, and you spotted that.  The numerous work visits, and texts.  All too much.  

I'll be more subtle next time.





Went dancing with Cammie last night.  Had a soooo much fun.  Almost watched her slap Keenan (for the second time).  It wasn't the best fun, but somehow, it was great.  

Tonight is possibly an Oshkosh visit to Cammie's cousin.  Not sure I'm looking forward to it after all that went down with the asshole last night.  Not sure I'm really looking forward to anything besides getting trashed.  And trying to forget.

Cammie and I are hitting up the hot firemen tonight.  For sure.

So much has been going on lately.

I've been hanging out with Cammie basically 24/7.  Seen a little of Nikoa, Brandon and Josh.

Gone to Derek's parties a lot.  

Met two other girls named Courtney, who were both really nice.

Drank a lot.  A whole lot.  Probably more this past week than any other this summer.

But it's all been fun.  Always having a great time.  

PS.  I am basically bald.  My hair it to my chin.  I cried, but it had to be done.  And it's blonde again.  I'm putting some dark streaks in it later for some more depth.

Well I'm back.  Been back I guess.  This really does suck.

I had a great time.  And now that I'm home I feel like I have nothing to look forward to.  Like, I wake up, go to work, come home, go to work again, come home, go to bed.  So routine, so un-emotional.  I need a hobby.

You're my hobby.

I can go out and party.  I've still got Nicole and Cammie.  But it feels almost pointless now that you're gone.  I need to go to Milwaukee.  This needs to be talked about.  

I'm going to go take a nap.

Horrible morning.

Where to start.  Extended Stay Settle Inn.

A woman and her husband and three kids have a room.  The husband's sister has her own.  Last night the woman went out while the siseter watched her kids.  The husband stayed in as well.  She gets back and is drunk, and can't get into her room because he has the deadbold on.  So she just sleeps in his sister's room.  

She still can't get into the room this morning so Dan (maintenance) and Ann go get the door open somehow.  They find him on the floor.  Blue.  With a needle lying next to him.  He o.d'd.  Dan ran and yelled for Angie to call an ambulance, and I was coming down the stairs then.  

I thought I was going to be sick.  I stood there and watched the police tell the wife and sister that he was dead.  Watched them tell the kids.  I can't imagine anything more horrible.

Then, I found out that I was the last person to clean that room (Thursday) so the police had to question me as to whether I saw any drugs or needles in the room.  I hadn't.

Wow.

Good news though.  Last night was fun. 

Party at Koa's, then went to Alan's, then two of Cammie's friends, and back to Alan's.  Got pretty drunk.

::I was drunk and having a great time while that man was dying::

Tonight is a party at Dan's and another at Alan's.
I'm sleeping at Cammie's.

I feel nauseous.

I hate confrontation.

Looks like I fucked up.

Shit.

So it's been awhile.  I figured I'd let you in on my great weekend.

Backtracking to Thursday.  I babysat for Nikoa had a party at her place.  Good times.  Ended up leaving there 2ish and went to Kevin's.  Stayed there.  Met his mom the next morning.  Yeah.

Friday.  I was feeling pretty sick from the night before so I went to bed at 9.  Sad.

Saturday Matt had a party.  I got way too drunk.  I fell down a hill (twice) and couldn't get back up.  Lost my shoes.  

Sunday I was sick again.  Yes for not knowing my limit.

Sunday I hung out with Nicole and Heidi for a bit at WallyWorld.  Then chilled at St. Norbs.  Sat at Andrew's until him mom scared us.  Then helped make a movie with Nick and Jonathan.  You'll see me running, falling, and dying.  Yes.

That's the brief.  I'm not into details.  That's just for me.
Ha.

I don't really understand what I'm feeling right now.

I'm sad.  But I can't wait for a change.

I'm nervous.  But I think I need this more than anything.

I want to get my life back on track.  Go back to school.  Get a real job.  Have a fulfilled life.

But who says I have to go to college to be fulfilled.  Besides my parents that is.  I'm not really sure if that's what I really want now, or if I've been brainwashed to believe it.  All I know is I can't fuck up again.  I'm done fucking up.  Done wasting mine and my parent's money.

My hair is REALLY dark right now.

I don't know if it's possible but the color of my hair makes me feel different.  When it's blonde I feel like it's okay for me to be ditzy.  And when it's dark, it's okay for me to be a bitch.
And right now, I just feel like I'm done being fucked with.
I'm done being the one who's used and left behind.  Really fuck it.
I hope you know what I mean.
I wish I didn't have to dye my hair to figure all of this out.
But it's totally worth it.

What started off as the best weekend ever has suddenly come crashing down.

Reel Big Fish was amazing.

My cousin's birthday party was fun.


But my baby cousin having brain cancer wipes out all the fun I'm having.  She doesn't have much longer.  

::Why does this always seem to happen to my family::

My aunt had liver cancer and passed two years ago.
My grandpa had lung cancer and passed two day before Thanksgiving last year.
Now this.

This is the worst day ever.

It's starting to hit me that everyone's leaving soon.

I feel like I'm being left behind again.

I know it's not really true.  But it's one of the most difficult feeling I've had.

I know I can visit, but it's not the same as being able to call up the girls for a random movie night.  

I feel like my friends are really all I have.

I'm going to have to get used to going to work and not seeing Ashley.  Or calling up Mary Beth to go to Kavarna.  Or head over to Nicole's at 7:00 to start drinking.

The part that's even harder for me is knowing that most of them won't be back next summer.  Ashley and Caitlyn will probably stay at their apartment in Madison.  Mary Beth and Nicole aren't sure yet, but they might stay too.  The only people coming back are Lisa, April, and Katie.  

I feel like I have nothing to look forward to.  

And I feel like if I visit too often my friends will get annoyed.
Even though that's not true either.

I'm not sure what I'm supposed to feel right now.
But I know I don't feel good.
And I think I'm going to go cry.

At least the summer is ending well.  I'm off to Milwaukee tonight with Mary Beth for Reel Big Fish at the Rave.

And yesterday Mary Beth and I went to Kavarna and then took Oscar for a walk.  Then we walked in the rain to Family Video and watched Prozaac Nation.  (Good movie, I heart Christina Ricci).

I found out that a girl I went to high school with killed herself this weekend.  

She was a grade older than me.
We were friends my sophomore year.
She had a baby.
She od'd on pills.
Her boyfriend had broken up with her for another girl.
Her funeral is Thursday.

I've never known anyone who took their own life.  Sure I've know people who've tried.  But none who were successful.

And I really don't know what to think.

Saturday night started out being one of the worst nights of my life.

Went to a wedding reception with Billy, Nikoa, and Abe.  Billy ended up getting in a fight and getting us kicked out.  So we went to Anduzzi's.  And I got my id taken.  

I really just wanted to turn around, go home, and cry.

But instead I went to this Matt kids duplex.  I surprising had a good time.  We played cards, and Texas Hold Em'. 

And I totally upheld to "the plan".  Yay me!  

I left happy.

Sunday I went to the beach with Mary Beth, Nicole and Lisa.  We layed out, we swam in FREEZING water, and got hit on by 12 year olds who are going to grow up to be horrible players.  Ate at Applebee's, and went back to Mary Beth's and stole her sweats and layed around and talked and watched Sex Talk with Sue or whatever it's called.

It ended up being a pretty good weekend.  And I only have my friends to thank for that.




I don't know what I'm going to do when they leave.  I know I'm going to cry.  I really hope I can handle this.

I hate you.

I feel like a dumb ridiculous girl again.

You got my hopes up, and didn't call.  No effort on your part.

Now I just want to crawl in bed and cry my life away.  Because I know it's going to happen again, just like it always does.

Why do I let people do this to me?

How naieve can I be.  I can understand if it was the first time, but I just seem to attract guys that lie.  Guys with no feelings whatsoever.

Goodnight.

I'll be getting smashed tomorrow night to make up for my misery.

Okay, I redid the layout again.  I'm so lame.

I get bored easily I guess.

Lame Monday night.

Will lead into a lame Tuesday night.

Which will lead into a let's make fun of Courtney at volleyball.
I am not special ed.  Thank you.  And hitting me with the volleyball does hurt.  Thanks again.  Jerks.

But I'm going anyway, and I'm going to play good.  Or at leas as good as I can. (I think that's supposed to be well, but I'm not sure, and I don't care.)

Oh, and I told my mom I had an interview with the Navy on Thursday.  She's SO pissed.  But she is the one who told me to get out of the house, so this is my way of getting out.  Besides, it's just an interview.  It doesn't mean anything.

Friday night has no words.  

Party at Koa's.  It was supposed to be only a few people until Brandon called Nicole.  We ended up with a keg.  And the 10 people he was bringing turned into 30.  The basement was filled, and Billy got pissed.  So I told everyone that no one else was allowed to come and if they had invited more people to call them and tell them to turn around because they could not come into the house.

Fun thing was that I got to kick someone out after they called me a bitch.  It was great.  Billy was right behind me.  
 
People from my high school were there.  My friend Cammie, and this guy Jason who hated me, but was all nice when he found out it was my best friend's house.  Ass.

Saturday was kind of lame.  Had a another keg party to go to, but it ended up being Cammie's ex-boyfriend's house, and he wouldn't let her in so we picked up some boys on Maine Street and hung out with them instead.

Last night a few of us watched EuroTrip at Catilyn's.  It was nice.  No drama.  Oddly enough.

How ridiculous is it that I just spent the last half hour crying my eyes out watching the season finale of Boy Meets World, when I've seen it like, 5,000,00 times.

I don't know what it is about that show.  It's so innocent.  It's not like the O.C, or Sex and the City.  It's like the characters remain untouched by the media.  They're not pushed into drinking, drugs, or sex.  

Somehow that amazes me.

I wish my life was like that.

That I wasn't fazed by glamour of it all.


I hate The Man.

Hung out with Nicki last night.

Went to a party of Brandon's.

It was Mike's birthday.

It was fun.  They were all really nice people.

Except for the creepy engaged guy who hit on Nicki.

Bob found the cutest cat ever and took it home and named it Missy.

I met lots of Democrats and had great conversation.  Even though we were all intoxicated.

Volleyball tonight.  Nicki invited the boys.  We'll see how that plays out.

Last night was nice.

Laguna Beach rocks my world.

Walmart is awesome.

Drama sucks.

Boys are douche monkeys.

My mom is a bitch.

Friends are a great thing to have.

I love the words douche and monkey put together. Damn you Casey. 

Still pissed about Warped Tour.

My toenails are pink.

So, we all know that the Warped Tour in Milwaukee cannot sell out because there is no maximum capacity.

It would have been nice to know that the Tweeter Center in Chicago can only hold 30,000 people.  And that 30,000 people had already bought there tickets before we drove 6 hours in 90 degree weather.

You can only imagine the looks on our faces when we pulled into the parking lot and saw a sign that said WARPED TOUR SOLD OUT.

I mean, six hours.  Honestly.  We screamed.  We yelled.  We swore.  Then we went to downtown Chicago.  Walked about, went back to Milwaukee and went to bed.  Woke up, ate, went thrifting, and came home.

I have now missed Warped Tour two years in a row.

I am incredibly pissed.

So my dad is in the hospital in Tennessee.  He decided it'd be cool to stop taking his anxiety meds and therefore, had a panic attack and a minor heart attack.  Smart boy he is.

So now my mom is on her way there, meaning that I have to stay home until she gets back on Saturday to take of the animals.

Meaning that I cannot go to Milwaukee with Mary Beth and Casey.  And have to drive down there myself on Saturday.

No way am I missing this again.  Not gonna happen.

Sex date with Josh on Monday.  (Not really though)

Last night was great.

Dinner started out kind of bad, but once we got to Lisa's it was all good.

Played "What the Fuck?", Drinking Jenga (I lost), and cards.  Andy stopped by, the rest of the boys were antisocial.  Mike and Cassidy stopped by too.  

Random squirt gun fights are the best.

Especially when you gang up against Nicole and get her soaked.

I fell in all the water mess we made and hurt my foot and my side pretty bad, lovely bruises to show for it.

All in all, it was a good night.



Tonight is gonna be hectic.

I've got to stop at Nikoa's barbeque, Cody Nascar's party, some Matt kids party, and possibly Alan's party.


.CRAZY.

So if Trey is not in this seasons Laguna Beach, I'm gonna be one really mad fan.  

I plan on going to New York and hunting that boy down one day.

And if you knew me, you'd knew I wasn't kidding.



Can someone be more perfect?



Last night I hung out with Mary Beth and her brother at some bar.  Fun times.  Then went back to her house and messed around with photoshop.

Tonight is the dress up movie and dinner night.  Hopefully fun.

I HAVE AN INTERVIEW WITH COST CUTTERS ON THURSDAY.

That's for the receptionist job.

I'll be getting a call soon about an interview to be an apprentice.

::Cross your fingers the August 1st class isn't full::

I talked to my mom about everything today.

If I don't get the apprenticeship, I'm going to Parkside second semester.
FOR SURE.

If I get in.  And get financial aid.




++I got the cutest green tennies today.  Totally Chicago-Warped-Tour-Worthy.
Can't wait!!++

Got back from Madison around 2ish.  

I don't really know if I had a good time or not.  It was worth the trip, worth seeing everyone, and hanging out.  But I don't know if it was really the trip I expected.

I'm never the mom.  I'm the one who needs the mom in most cases.  But last night I took on a new role.  I may not have been the best, or said the right things, or had the most patience.  Okay, so I had no patience.  But it wasn't that bad of a feeling.  Not something I want to do again, but something I know I can do.

Now I understand how Ashley feels.

How I'd love to say that to someone someday.

Went to Door County with Ashley today.

What can I say.  Clean car or go swimming?  Um obvious answer there.

Drove a jet ski for the first time.  Scared me to death.  Of course tubeing was worse.  Ashley was taken out on a gigantic wave, and I on a mini one.  Go me. 

But I didn't die.  Or get run over by the jet ski.

It was a fun day.

Lets see how sunburned I am tomorrow.

COHEED AND CAMBRIA ROCKS MY WORLD! Okay so they were great. I had fun. But I'm exhausted. NEW JERSEY LIGHTS! I am so unbeliviabley (can't spell that word, my apologies) happy that they played Devil In Jersey City!! Just got done watching Coach Carter. And must I admit that I think Timo Cruz was GORGEOUS!?! Okay so I have horrible taste in boys. We all know that by now. Damn. Okay, so I was planning on napping, but now I'm quite wired. Fuck. But I'm a little upset that April's messages to me never made it to the screen. I guess they couldn't use naughty ones. But I'm comfortable with the fact that I make her hot and bothered. lol. And that Jon likes little boys. (Who's Jon again?) Crazy. So if you read this entry earlier you'd notice I took out a small portion. I realized that I don't know who reads this, and certain people may take it one way, and others another. I don't want to have to defend my actions, so I just deleted it. Because running away from and avoiding things seems to solve everything lately. ::Pictures, Click it::

Okay weekend and such.

Apparently I was posessed last night.

Sorry Casey.

Fireworks were good.  Not the best time, but I'll live.

Still confused.

Coheed tonight.  I get to see Emily and Mike and co.  Could be good times.

Pretty sure I'm an alcoholic and I need to stop drinking until Saturday.  (Madison, yes!)  And I'm going to see if that works.  

Got yelled at today because I'm never home.

Let's see, Wednesday was volleyball, Thursday Daanen's, Friday was Nicole's, Saturday was Casey's, Sunday was Mary Beth's, Last night was Casey's, tonight is Coheed, tomorrow is Volleyball... Thursday and Friday are yet unknown but something will come up, and Saturday is Madison.

I hate my house.  Thank you all for you parties.  And puting up with me.

Love you!

All I have to say is this.

TRL needs to give us back FOB.

I hate MTV.

Minus Laguna Beach and the Real World.  Those are the only exception.

Thank You.

Yes.

Quite hungover.

Had a good time.

Did it again.

Dumb girl.

Awkward.

Can't quite piece everything together.  Don't really understand anything anymore.  

But the truth is, I don't care to understand it.  I'm having fun.

NAKED POOL PARTY TONIGHT!!  What?!?

Nap time.  Need more than 4 hours of sleep.

So I have come to the coclusion that when I drink I drink too muck.

I always know what I'm doing, and I don't make bad decisions per say.  I just don't control the things that come out of my mouth.

So I really feel like a dumb girl now.

I mean, I've done it so many times before, but last night was somehow different.  I feel like everyone thinks it's getting old and is laughing at me.

Like, "There goes Courtney, kissing another boy she just met"

So I really just feel dumb.  

And it's going to make me feel awkward around them, and everyone knows I avoid that at all costs.  I run.  I can't stand that feeling.

So we'll how akward tonight is.  

And the quote of last night, "but he called ME!"

Oh glorious!

So like every other holiday and special occasion my mom must find something to say or do to ruin the entire day.

And today was no different.

You know the feeling you get in your stomach when you're just so angry and upset you feel like you could throw up, but there's something blocking it in your throat.  ::too many details, I know::

I have that now.


I hate birthdays.

Well, happy birthday to me I guess.

I'm taking my mom out for a pedicure, since I never got her anything for Mother's Day.

After that I have no plans.

How great is that?  I guess I could throw in a Dawson's Creek scenario and say I'm cursed like Pacey.  (Oh Pacey) That was the episode on today anyway.

We'll have to see if things turn around.

Thanks Mike.  

I can't wait untill Summerfest.

Party went okay.  It only sprinkled a little bit.

Got sort of drunk.  Had a good time.

Not much to say.

Tonight was wierd.

I hate it when people pretend that things didn't happen.  That everything's okay and normal.

But I have to pretend too.  I don't want to be another dumb girl.

But that's all I am.

one word.  motherfuckingrain.  yes.  that's right.

Let's just hope that the storm misses us, because I'm not giving up on my party.  

Someone find me a four leaf clover.

And a rabbit's foot.

I need some luck.

P.S.  I got really really drunk last night.  And I must quote Mary Beth.

"Courtney, what the fuck did we do."

Wow.

The countdown is over.

Tomorrow is my interview.

Tomorrow is my party.

I can just feel something bad in the pit of my stomach.

I want everything to be perfect.  I want everyone to be happy.

Why do I feel like I need everyone to like me?


::keep those fingers crossed::

New journal.

Just so you know.

Deleted NewAct17.  Personal reasons.  Ask and I shall tell.

But it's still me.

So my birthday is in exactly one week.

My party is Friday.

I'm nervous as fuck.

I just have this fantasy that everything's perfect, everyone gets along, and there's no drama.

But of course nothing's ever perfect, and I can just see something bad happening. 

Thankfully Ashley is helping me plan, since we all know I don't. I do things on whim, and this party is not necessarily something that should happen that way.

I have directions to print, alcohol to buy, tents to find. 
Hopefully it all comes together.

::cross your fingers::
